title: 你们都跟谁一起打游戏？？
author: 小稽jieshuo
txt_content: 你们不知道有一个对象的快乐

replies.txt_content:
老婆？
当然是模拟人生的MC次元的立体人了(笑

replies.author: 美味的曲奇
replies.txt_content:
秀对象，举报了（bushi
我玩个寂寞

replies.author: PercyDan
replies.txt_content: 自己找网友打

replies.author: 小稽jieshuo
replies.txt_content: 当然有对象，还是外国人，她来自想象

replies.author: 回到家啊
replies.txt_content: ？这里也能杀狗吗？

replies.author: 小桔PxJOvO
replies.txt_content: 找朋友，没有对象=-=

replies.author: qpmhhh
replies.txt_content: 当然是和基友

replies.author: 酥宁最酥啦
replies.txt_content:
网友 / 同学

没有女朋友

replies.author: wishdsb
replies.txt_content: npy是不存在的，当然跟舍友拉

replies.author: My222
replies.txt_content: 和同一个朋友玩了9年游戏

replies.author: Friction
replies.txt_content: 我酸了，我大部分时间自己玩，有时候跟朋友，我这帮朋友老鸽子了

replies.author: GXHurry
replies.txt_content: 和自己好友

replies.author: 剑-God
replies.txt_content: 对象？不存在的。基友多快乐

replies.author: 开心的阿诺
replies.txt_content: Hyp随机匹配的人

replies.author: canglongbeta
replies.txt_content: 和好朋友，npy没有

replies.author: S.Youk
replies.txt_content: 从头像就可以看出来，是个有老婆的人

replies.author: sky0306
replies.txt_content: 应该是朋友吧，你开心就好。

replies.author: 陈喵
replies.txt_content: 和自己

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content: 有对象还玩啥游戏

replies.author: Moming17
replies.txt_content: 当然是跟好朋友啊，对象是什么？

replies.author: 发光的章鱼.
replies.txt_content: 网友使我快乐

replies.author: louyukai
replies.txt_content: 你跟村民一起打游戏吧
